definitions.body: :Ec 10:6 height (poet.);—abs. ´[[מ]]: Mic 6:6 +; cstr. [[מְרוֹם]] 2Ki 19:23 +; pl. [[מְרוֹמִים]] Is 33:16 +; cstr. [[מְרוֹמֵי]] Ju Jdg 5:18; sf. [[מְרוֹמָיו]] Job 25:2;—

height, elevation (concr.), elevated place: [[מְרוֹמֵי שָׂדֶה]] Job 5:18, [[בְּראׁשׁ מְרׂמִים]] Pr 8:2; [[מְרוֹם שִׁבְתּוֹ]] Ob:Ob 3 (cf. Now), [[מְרוֹם גִּבְעָה]] in ‖ Je 49:16; [[הָרִים]] ´[[מ]]: top of mts. 2Ki 19:23 = Is 37:24, [[קִצּוֹ]] ´[[מ]]: v:Is 37:24 b; [[עֻזׇּהּ]] ´[[מ]]: Je 51:53 (of Bab.); specif. of Zion, ´[[מ]]: Je Je 17:12, ´[[מ]]: [[חִיּוֹן]] Je 31:12, [[יִשְׂרָאֵל]] ´[[בְּהַר מ]]: Ez Eze 17:23, Eze 20:40, ´[[יִשׂ]] :´[[בְּהָרֵי מ]]: Eze 34:14; indef., Hb Hab 2:9 (in fig.), ´[[לָשׂוּם שְׁפָלִים לְמ]]: Job 5:11; [[בַּמְּרוֹמִים רַבִּים]] Ec 10:6 (of hilgh office, rank; opp. [[שֵׁפֶל]]); [[ישְׁבֵי מָרוֹם]] Is 26:5, i.e. in (supposed) security, cf. [[מְרוֹמִים יִשְׁכּׂן]] Is 33:16 (‖[[מְחָדוֹת סְלָעִים ]]); ´[[לַמּ]]: on high (Germ. in die Höhe) Ps 75:6, so ´[[בַּמּ]]: Job 39:18, adv. = in a high place Is 22:16.

´[[מ]]: alone = height of heaven: [[אֱלֽהֵי מָרוֹם]] Mic 6:6; 2Sa 22:17 = Ps 18:17, Is 24:21, Is 24:21, Is 32:15, Is 57:15, Is 58:4, La 1:13, Ps 7:8, Ps 68:19, Ps 71:19, Ps 93:4, Ps 144:7, pl. Job 25:2; ‖[[שָׁמַיִם ]], [[קָדְשׁוֹ]] ´[[מ]]: Ps 102:20 [[מְרוֹמִים]] Job 16:19, Ps 148:1; ‖[[מְעוֹן קָדְשׁוֹ ]] Je 25:30, ‖[[מָָעַל ]] Job 31:2 (pl.), opp. [[מוֹסְדֵי אֶרֶץ]] Is 24:18.; as pred. of ´[[י]]: Ps 92:9 cf. Ps 10:5; as adv. (i.e. in heaven) Is 33:5; ´[[לַמּ]]: towards heaven Is 38:14, Is 40:26, Is 37:23 = 2Ki 19:22; ´[[מִמּ]]: in fig. Ps 73:8 they speak (as if) from the sky, from heaven (i.e. so arrogantly).
´[[מ]]: adv. fig., = proudly Ps 56:3 (so Gei Hup-Now al., cf. Che, but dub.), Bae in high station; Du reads [[מַריוֹם]] ([[יוֹם]] to v:Ps 56:4; as dittogr.?).
